analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#85) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#88-91)

BoostoPool.fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#336-350) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bst.transfer(msg.sender,BSTAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#344-345)

BoostoPool.adminWithdraw (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#363-373) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-bst.transfer(msg.sender,bstBalance) (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#371)

BoostoPool.adminAddWinner (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#386-400) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-StandardToken(BSTContract).transfer(investorsList[winnerIndex],bonus) (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#399-400)

Reentrancy in BoostoPool.fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#336-350):
	External calls:
	- bst.transfer(msg.sender,BSTAmount) (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#344-345)
	External calls sending eth:
	- fundsWallet.transfer(msg.value) (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#340-341)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- investors (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#349)
	- investorsList (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#345-349)
	- totalInvestors (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#349-350)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#85)
BoostoPool.BSTContract should be constant (/unique_chucks/33/0x89ecb37eec822cd2d299bd1106e4e8c7d187a260.sol#237-240)
